name: Scooters Run
description:
Moto endless run in the subway or city traffic on night .
Surfs or rush as fast as you can!
Get more and more high score in the world rank, check your medal!

Run your motorbikes in the night with fast speed to escape from policeman. Various exciting music to rush and skill action in your scooters. Endless run in the different scenery: subway to escape the dodge the oncoming trains, escape the police car, taxi and bus on the city road, beautiful night scene to surfs as fast as you can!

Moto run is the best running game, surfs, rush and dash as fast as you can . Jump, Flip, Slide with different bike action, Need you to excise more time with this skill. 4 characters to choose, 8 motorbikes to drive, such as Oasis Bike, Olive Moto, Orange Moto, Rose Moto, Mustang Moto, Universe Moto, Sea Moto and Hummer Moto.

There are many surprise of MYSTERY BOX, Score booster, MEGA headstart to help you get more scores and coins. Get it in the shop with some coins. Other props, such as jetpack, coins magnet, 2x MULTIPLER, helmet to increase power-up duration.

Moto Runner Features:
.Moto run in the night
.Excited music and background
.More skill action with scooters
.Endless rush as fast as you can
.Dodge the oncoming trains
.Avoid the different obstacle
.4 characters to choose
.8 motorbikes to drive
.Jump, flip or slide with different action
.More props to increase your power-up

Join the most daring chase!
